title: Pressure cooker pork fillet
ingredients: ['4 tablespoons fresh coriander leaves', '4 tablespoons olive oil', '4 tablespoons lime juice', '2 cloves garlic, sliced', '1/2 teaspoon crushed chillies or to taste', '1/4 teaspoon salt or to taste', '450g pork fillet', '175ml chicken stock', '4 tablespoons lemon juice']
